settings.heading: Get clearer skin in just 1 single step
settings.text:
The Only Step: Attach the Filter

Follow the included instructions to securely attach the filter to your faucet. Then wash your face morning and night with your preferred cleanser and Q-urified water and enjoy smoother, more hydrated skin after just a few weeks of consistent use.

Check here to see if Q-urify Water Filter is compatible with your faucet.

settings.heading: Will it fit my faucet?
settings.text: Q-urify is compatible with almost every circular removable aerator, and each filter comes with 8 adaptors to help fit different faucet sizes. However, please note that it will NOT fit faucets that are square shaped, pull out, hand-held, spray-style, or faucets with a sensor.

settings.heading: How does tap water harm my skin?
settings.text:
Facial skin is more sensitive than your skin anywhere else. Your skin barrier is like a protective shield against outside threats. But the stuff in tap water can harm it, leading to:

  • Dry and Damaged Skin: Tap water can strip away your skin's natural oils, leaving it dry and damaged.
  • Skin Irritation: It might also cause skin irritation, making it sensitive and red.
  • Premature Aging: The chemicals in tap water can even speed up the aging process, causing wrinkles and fine lines.

settings.heading: What does it filter in the water?
settings.text: Q-urify water filter uses both physical and chemical filtration components to help remove known as skin irritants that make your tap water “hard” – like calcium, magnesium and chlorine.

settings.heading: Will it fit my faucet?
settings.text: It’s compatible with almost every circular removable aerator! Each Q-urify Water Filter kit comes with 8 adaptors to help fit different faucet sizes. Please note that it will NOT fit faucets that are square shaped, pull out, hand-held, spray-style, or faucets with a sensor.

settings.heading: What skin types can benefit from Q-urify Water Filter?
settings.text: Every skin type! Especially helpful for anyone experiencing sensitive skin, premature aging, dry skin, and acne.

settings.heading: How often do I need to replace my filter?
settings.text: With daily use, your Q-urify water filter needs to be replaced at least once every three months for your skin to look and feel its best. Once it gets past the 3 month mark, your filter starts to lose its efficacy. We wash our face everyday so make sure you are looking after your skin.

settings.heading: Where can I buy replacement filters?
settings.text: Replacement filters can be purchased on our site for 3 months of pure water. We also offer subscription plans for your convenience and ease.

settings.heading: Can I turn OFF the filtered water?
settings.text: Yes! The Q-urify Water Filter has the option of switching off filtered water. You can turn on and on the purified water by switching to this option on the right side.

settings.heading: What’s the difference between ‘hard water’ and ‘soft water’?
settings.text:
Hard water is water that contains a high quantity of dissolved minerals (like calcium and magnesium). Where soft water has been treated, so that the only ion remaining is sodium. When rainwater falls, it is naturally soft. 

However, as water makes its way through the ground and into our waterways, it picks up minerals like chalk, lime, calcium and magnesium and becomes hard water. Hard water is to blame for dishes with spots, dingy looking clothes, and residue and soap scums in bathrooms. Soap and cleansers are also less effective with hard water due to its reaction to the magnesium and calcium, which makes the lather not as rich and bubbly and leaves hair feeling sticky and dull.
